content.body: Hi, I can't make it tonight as this is quite late for me. Some points regarding the captureStackTrace discussion:
* I like the proposal giving implementers choice over accessor vs. data property very much. It reflects web reality and there are good reasons for both choices.
content.formatted_body: • I like the proposal giving implementers choice over accessor vs. data property very much. It reflects web reality and there are good reasons for both choices.

content.body: * We can change our setter to not write to the private field in V8. That should not be a problem.
content.formatted_body: • We can change our setter to not write to the private field in V8. That should not be a problem.

content.body: * I was pointed at https://github.com/tc39/proposal-error-stack-accessor and if we shouldn't rather follow that proposal, such that normal Errors and custom error objects end up behaving the same? In particular that one already did solve the problem with the setter.
content.formatted_body: • I was pointed at https://github.com/tc39/proposal-error-stack-accessor and if we shouldn't rather follow that proposal, such that normal Errors and custom error objects end up behaving the same? In particular that one already did solve the problem with the setter.
